title: These two items are a fucking mistake
body:
{{item:3107}} {{item:3190}} 
Seriously every freaking game im dominating and my support does not build these and the enemy builds them we lose, my burst gets healed or negated and then i can no longer carry off doing tons of damage and poking the enemy team off objectives. i jut had a 0-6 akali go 7-7 cause she was unkillable with a gunblade + a soraka with those two items. and guess what i was dominating and bot lane was doing great but bard goes ruby sightstone and the ghost item with no items to help our team and enemy soraka goes locket an redemption and its litterally impossible to kill their team even though they had a shit team comp it was just impossible to kill akali or tris cause of these busted ass items.
